channel.title: CVE Feed for NEOJAPAN Inc. -- Denbun POP version V3.3P R4.0 and earlier
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NEOJAPAN Inc. -- Denbun POP version V3.3P R4.0 and earlier

item.title: CVE-2018-0685|2024-08-05T03:35:49.041Z -- neojapan%20inc. -- denbun%20pop%20version%20v3.3p%20r4.0%20and%20earlier
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in the Denbun POP version V3.3P R4.0 and earlier allows remote authenticated attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via HTTP requests for mail search.
